attr.name: name
attr.comment: This field should be unique, at least within its pipeline.

attr.name: root
attr.comment: Storage directory for use by the stage for data (must be unique)

attr.name: destinationRoot
attr.comment: This is the root storage directory of a Server Side import service that would receive the files from a Client GlobusExportService. This is similar to providing a URL in HttpExportService - the URL pointing to a Server ImportService. With GlobusOnline, we don't need a Server Import Service and will instead use a GCMU pointing to this "destinationRoot"

attr.name: sourceUsername
attr.comment: This the username to be used to activate the destination Endpoint. If empty, then it is assumed to be a public endpoint and auto-activation without username/passwd will be tried.

attr.name: sourcePassword
attr.comment: This the password to be used to activate the destination Endpoint. If empty, then it is assumed to be a public endpoint and auto-activation without username/passwd will be tried.

attr.name: destinationUsername
attr.comment: This the username to be used to activate the destination Endpoint. If empty, then it is assumed to be a public endpoint and auto-activation without username/passwd will be tried.

attr.name: destinationPassword
attr.comment: This the password to be used to activate the destination Endpoint. If empty, then it is assumed to be a public endpoint and auto-activation without username/passwd will be tried.

attr.name: certfile
attr.comment: This is the user's Cert file that is typically installed with Globus Connect. This x509 cert file should be added to "Manager Identities" on www.globusonline.org

attr.name: keyfile
attr.comment: Path to the keyfile for the User Cert

attr.name: cafile
attr.comment: Path to the cacert files. Two valid cacerts are provided with GlobusExportService under cacerts directory

attr.name: transferWaitTime
attr.comment: Time in Minutes for the GlobusExportService to wait for the transfer to complete before giving up

attr.name: filesPerTransfer
attr.comment: Total number of files to be grouped within each transfer. Globus Online allows us to group the files into one transfer.

attr.name: sourceEP
attr.comment: The Client Globus Endpoint, typicall the local Globus Connect

attr.name: destinationEP
attr.comment: The destination Globus Endpoint, typically the GCMU on the server side

attr.name: zip
attr.comment: Zip data objects before transmission (yes/no)

attr.name: username
attr.comment: The Globus Online username of the Client (typically for the Globus Connect user)

attr.name: password
attr.comment: The password for authentication, if required by the GO Endpoint

attr.name: acceptDicomObjects
attr.comment: Accept received DicomObjects (yes/no)

attr.name: acceptXmlObjects
attr.comment: Accept received XmlObjects

attr.name: acceptZipObjects
attr.comment: Accept received ZipObjects

attr.name: acceptFileObjects
attr.comment: Accept received FileObjects

attr.name: dicomScript
attr.comment: The script file determining whether DicomObjects are to be accepted for transmission

attr.name: xmlScript
attr.comment: The script file determining whether XmlObjects are to be accepted for transmission

attr.name: zipScript
attr.comment: The script file determining whether ZipObjects are to be accepted for transmission

attr.name: quarantine
attr.comment: Storage directory for quarantined objects
